description: Locations from the NYC Green Infrastructure initiative which presents an alternative approach to improving water quality that integrates “green infrastructure,” such as swales and green roofs, with investments to optimize the existing system and to build targeted, cost-effective “grey” or traditional infrastructure.

name: DEP Green Infrastructure
